title: Nerf Lissandra
body: Nerf Lissandra please. She is maybe the last viable counter to your beloved Zed. Please nerf her to the ground. And remove Zhonya of course. There is too much counterplay against Zed.

—and we have Sejuani for that already, soooo, single target stun makes more sense (especially since she can also ult herself).

I would say her scaling is quite poor compared to your average mage, though she does come with more CC than your average mage (and mobility is also quite unique to her). That said her invincibility is tied to either Zhonya's or her ult and if she uses both of those on herself then her CC is actually mediocre, consisting entirely of two separate slows and an AOE snare (which isn't bad but if you're choosing someone for their CC you expect actual disables).

She has trade-offs - if she goes for survivability by ulting herself then she instantly becomes less of a team fight presence than (as regards mid laners) someone like Orianna (I'd take Shockwave over Lissandra's AOE slow/snare) or Syndra and (as regards top laners), people like Sion and Gnar. Plus, the act of teleporting into the enemy team leaves you very vulnerable unless your invincibility can ride out the entire team fight. As an APC she is very, very prone to being focused and when your entire team fight plan is "dive in and hope your invincibility is enough to keep you safe for the entire fight", you're taking a big risk.

Liss to me seems like a meta pick rather than a "sleeper OP" champ. She's one of the best anti-assassins in the game, being one of few mages capable of fending off Zed, and her mana passive is more valuable than typically due to the recent gutting of Athene's Unholy Grail. Both of those things are massive advantages to her. Team fight compositions are popular right now and Liss fits right in there too, alongside other popular top laners like Gnar, Sion and more recently Lulu.

Liss is arguably a bit too good *in this meta* but I don't think that's because of any inherent toxic nature in her kit, because I think a lot of it really is quite fair. I would say she is only performing so strongly because the game right now is arguably about as Lissandra-friendly as it could possibly be, while being very unfriendly to everyone she competes with. If she gets nerfed and then the meta changes to not suit her she will completely collapse in playability.

Yi counters zed in many ways. You can dodge his ulti with your Q if you have somthing else aroud to Q and you can negate 50-70% of his damage WHILE healing with meditate and also reset your autos...Movespeed to catch up to him if he tries to run.

This^ so much this. I made a thread about this several weeks ago. Yi basically does everything you need to have to counter Zed; ability to dodge spells, ability to negate almost the entirety of Zed's burst, ability to out split push, ability to not care about OOM, good roam, and strong carry power, as well as better team fighting.

Personally I counterpick Zed with Riven. Riven's kit makes Zed think twice about going in. During Zed's untargetability frame, Riven counters with Blade of the Exile. As soon as Zed appears, Ki Burst stuns him so you can perform a Broken Wings fast combo into the active of Ravenous Hydra and then reactivate Blade of the Exile to finish Zed off. Valor can then be used to negate the detonation of Death Mark, as both abilities have identical AD ratios (not counting the scaling damage.) Plus if Zed opts to go in on an ally, Riven can still stun, whereas Yi can only save himself.
